name: Calaboose
description:
Calaboose, built in about 10 hours on a friday night.

Make your way out of your cell and kill the guard. Take his keys to get access to and fight the other prisoners and become the shot caller!

Up to 4-player multiplayer support.

Controls: Keyboard/PS4/XBOX360

Xbox 360

Start/restart: A
Move: left thumbstick
Punch: X
Jump: A

Playstation 4

Start/restart: X
Move: left thumbstick
Punch: square
Jump: X

Keyboard - Player 1

Start/restart: right-alt
Move: arrow keys
Punch: right-shift
Jump: right-alt

Keyboard - Player 2

Move: WASD
Punch: E
Jump: Q
